backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with authorization checks and a public contact form system storing timestamped submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping branding, title, and logo update requirements to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, their roles, and updated Quick bee Agency branding.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry containing root mount point and updated Quick bee Agency document title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and five primary routes for the site.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component showing brand logo, navigation links, service links, and contact options.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and CTA button using siteConfig.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering header, dynamic page content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/CtaBlo: Reusable CTA block with title, description, and primary/secondary action buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqAcc: Renders an FAQ accordion with toggling answers using local state and predefined FAQ data.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IconBu: Displays a list of benefits with icons, titles, and descriptions in a two-column grid.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PlanCa: Shows a pricing plan card with features, price, CTA link, and optional popular highlighting.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proble: Presents a grid of common business problems with icons and styled warning cards.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays a service description card with sections for what it is, why it matters, and business impact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Renders testimonials and a case study highlighting business results and improvements.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThreeS: Shows a three-step process with icons and descriptions explaining the workflow.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ValueP: Displays a grid of core value items with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Whatsa: Provides a styled WhatsApp contact button linking to the configured WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Exports site configuration including name, descriptions, WhatsApp details, contact info, and CTAs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state, stored identities, and helper hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a minimal wrapper for react-query, intended as a place to add future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including color palettes, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission text, value propositions, and marketing sections describing the company's approach.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission via useContactForm, plus marketing sections and WhatsApp contact option.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home page with hero content, benefits, pricing highlights, and multiple marketing components.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows pricing tiers, ROI benefits, and marketing sections using PlanCard components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page that renders a services list with marketing copy and a hero section using ServiceCard, CtaBlock, and siteConfig.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the websiteâ€™s goals, theme, features, requirements, and known issues.
